name: Pixel Devil and the Broken Cartridge
description: Classic platformer in the style of Pixel-art. The main character goes to the world of 8-bit games to save his girlfriend. Help him to find new abilities and find out who is behind the abduction of the girl.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Pentium 4 800 MHZ or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: ATI or NVidia card w/256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI or NVidia card w/512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
